price: Daha sonra iman edip, hicret eden ve sizin yanınızda cihat edenler, onlar da sizdendir. Akrabalar, Allah’ın kitabında (miras hususunda) birbirlerine daha yakındır. Allah, şüphesiz her şeyi bilendir.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ مَعَكُمۡ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمۡۚ وَأُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡضٖ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمُۢ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū min baʿdu wahājarū wajāhadū maʿakum fa-ulāika minkum wa-ulū al-arḥāmi baʿḍuhum awlā bibaʿḍin fī kitābi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
